entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
